word: The measure of the Holy Spirit we receive will be proportionate to the measure of our desire, and the faith exercised for it, and the use we shall make of the light and knowledge that shall be given to us. We shall be entrusted with the Holy Spirit according to our capacity to receive and our ability to impart it to others.--Letter 54, 1894, pp. 1, 2. (To Elder O. A. Olsen, June 10, 1894.)
